update biz_dispatch_package
waybill_no = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
outstock_no = #{outstockNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
warehouse_code = #{warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select id, waybill_no as waybillNo, outstock_no as outstockNo, warehouse_code as warehouseCode, warehouse_name as warehouseName, customerid, customer_name as customerName, transport_type as transportType, transport_temperature_type as transportTemperatureType, holding_time as holdingTime, pack_operate_type as packOperateType, season, pack_box_type as packBoxType, pack_group_no as packGroupNo, pack_plan_no as packPlanNo, pack_plan_name as packPlanName, fees_no as feesNo, is_calculated as isCalculated, del_flag as delFlag, write_time as writeTime, calculate_time as calculateTime, remark from biz_dispatch_package where 1=1 and waybill_no in
#{item}
